attributes.additional_details:
Pfizer/Biontech vaccine is heavily applied in Turkey
Pfizer/BioNTech is an mRNA vaccine approved by EMA, FDA, and WHO.
Turkey's vaccination certificate can be checked with a QR code.
The vaccination certificate issued by Turkey is considered valid by many countries, including the EU countries.
Even if it is spent at home, the quarantine process is a waste of time. It is disrupting people's work and studies.
attributes.background: With the latest travel update, Turkey is on the amber list. However, as the Turkish vaccination is not still recognized by the UK, compulsory house quarantine continues. Turkey currently offers BioNTech/Pfizer vaccines. We demand that the vaccination certificate be accepted as valid by the UK.

rejection.details:
We think this petition is similar

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/594456
